main.summary:
Backend engineer with 3 years and 7 months of experience across 4 domains (Education, Healthcare, Clinical Trials, Gaming), achieving quantifiable results including 82% BigQuery cost reduction, complete resolution of clinical trial system Deadlocks, and contributing to major hospital contract acquisitions.

Specialized in system design from monolithic to Event-Driven cloud-native architectures, creating long-term business value through root cause analysis and systematic solutions.

Data Consistency: Transaction safety implementation in distributed environments
Microservices Transition: Service separation and independent deployment from monolithic
Incident Analysis & Resolution: Root cause identification and complete resolution of complex concurrency issues
Scalable Design: Architecture improvements overcoming existing system limitations
Fault Tolerance: Service continuity even during external dependency failures
